flawed_nl_solution:
Beatrice looked at 3 x 8 TVs at an online store = <<3*8=24>>24 TVs.
She looked at 8 TVs in person + 24 TVs online = <<8+24=23>>23 TVs.
Beatrice looked at 42 TVs in all - the 23 she looked at = <<42-23=19>>19 TVs she looked at on an auction site.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 32, not 23. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
